comment: There's a clock on Putin's desk, that he gave to Kadyrov on March . On March it's back on the desk?

      :snt1 (c / clock
            :location (d / desk
                  :poss (p / person
                        :name (n / name

            :ARG1-of (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 p

      :snt2 (b / back
